title: EirisProject
author: EirisProject
content: EIRIS Project, an avant-garde cryptocurrency project poised to revolutionize privacy-focused social interaction. Blending the best of decentralized technology with robust privacy safeguards, EIRIS is not just a crypto project; it's a paradigm shift in how we interact socially in the digital realm.üî• Key Highlights of EIRIS: üî•Decentralized Social Networking: A high-performance, scalable, and privacy-centric platform, putting user privacy at the forefront.Advanced Privacy Tech: Incorporating private addresses, anonymous TOKENS, and private smart contracts for a complete privacy financial ecosystem.MPoS Nodes: Leveraging decentralized MPoS nodes for creating a high-speed, private global network, fostering a community-oriented ecosystem.Smart Contract Development: Focusing on anonymity, our smart contracts are designed to support a privacy-oriented social civilization.Real-World Connection: EIRIS goes beyond cryptocurrency norms, offering practical applications and real-world connectivity.üåü Tokenomics & Distribution: üåüTotal Supply: 142,857,000 EIRISConsensus Mechanism: PoW + MPoSBlock Details: 60s Time, 480s Confirmation, 4M SizeA balanced TGE: PoW mining, private placements, and allocations for institutional collaborations within the EIRIS ecosystem.üõ£Ô∏è Roadmap Insights: üõ£Ô∏è2018-2023: Development of EIRIS's core technologies and network.2023: Mainnet launch, EIRIS Block Explorer, Mobile Wallet, and MPoS, IM developments.2024-2025: Introduction of IM, MPoS, Anonymous TOKEN, EVM compatibility, and the VRF+MPoS Consensus Mechanism.We are excited to announce the initial launch of EIRIS, a privacy-focused social messaging app, currently in its test version in Asia. This innovative chat app is designed to ensure privacy, with plans for the server to eventually run on each mPoS node. In preparation for our official community operations commencing in 2024, we will be releasing the official website, testnet, development documentation, and various other related resources very soon. During this phase, our team will maintain a low profile, working diligently behind the scenes. We extend an invitation to you to join us on this groundbreaking journey with EIRIS, where the future of privacy and social interaction seamlessly intertwine.For more details, visit us at: Telegram Group: https://t.me/+TFQEykpp-F03ODI9WhitePaper: https://github.com/EirisProjet/WhitePaper/releases/download/v1.0/EIRIS_PROJECT_WP.pdfApp Demo: https://app.windbank.net/ribbit.1.1.6.apkInvest responsibly. Cryptocurrency investments carry risks; always conduct thorough research before investing.
